msbt.message: My goodness, writing on stone like that must have been quite difficult!To go to such lengths, they must have had something VERY important to say, .
I'm told this valiant statue depicts the goddess of victory.Though it's not much of a victory if you've lost your head, now is it, darling?
His name is David?!With a regal pose like that, he looks more like a Philip to me, my dear.

Darling, be honestâ€”what do you think of this smileOr how about this smileOh, I give up! I've been trying to imitate this famous painting's coy smile, but I can't seem to get it right. She makes it look so easy, !

Everything about the moving painting is absolutely gorgeous. I absolutely love it, ! Though, I do wish the central character had a nice shawl to throw about her shoulders. I can't help but worry she might catch a cold, .
The subjects of this amazing painting look as though they might charge right off the canvas! It would be a bit scary if they did, but at least I'd get a better look at their fabulous outfits, !
Just look at all of those fabulous outfits, darling!What I wouldn't give to step back in time and dress in those elegant fashions, .
I tell you, the bold woman leading the people in this worthy painting I would follow her anywhere!
It's extraordinary how much beauty and sorrow has been captured by this one painting. My goodness, but I do feel awash in emotions each time I look at it, .
My stars, but that island is not at all the kind of bright and cheery place we are accustomed to here. But you knowwith a bit of tender loving care, I'm sure we could have it fixed right up, !
Oh, how this painting speaks to me, darling! The luxurious scenery! The sophisticated people! I dare say it truly captures where it is I belong, .
This painting makes splendid use of color, don't you think?It's so pretty, it makes me want to give up my lessons and take a painting class instead.
It can't have been easy to capture the power of Mother Nature in a single still painting like this And yet, there it is! A truly moving piece of art, .
This warrior statueit's so realistic! I can't help but worry it will start moving all of a sudden!
It's very ornatelike some sort of fancy doll from ancient times.And to think, we don't really know what they were used for. It's all so wonderfully mysterious!

I know they say this sculpture is meant to depict a man deep in thought But how do we know he's not just trying to sneak in a quick nap without anyone noticing? I wouldn't put it past a certain busy business tycoon I know to try something like that, .
Why, ! It says this piece was donated by YOU!I had no idea you had such a passion for the arts. Paint me impressed!
